div.div: THE FUTURE IS SCREENS ON EVERY APPENDAGE
We’ve been hearing about “wearable computing” for years. But we’re finally at a tipping point. It sounds crazy, but the cyborgification of humanity is proceeding apace.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UOuSAa&via=Digg&text=The Internet Of You

div.div: "The rest of the world has reacted to the idea of such a child with horror and incomprehension. I sympathize with the horror. I can only wish that I shared the incomprehension... I was like him."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Zrp9Gg&via=Digg&text=I Was Adam Lanza

div.a: The North Dakota Town Where A One-Bedroom Apartment Rents For $2,100 A Month

div.div: Williston is not New York City. There are 30,000 residents and one department store. The nearest city is two hours away. So why are rents so high?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UYkNlq&via=Digg&text=The North Dakota Town Where A One-Bedroom Apartment Rents For $2,100 A Month

div.a: What Happens When You Teach Watson The Urban Dictionary

div.div: IBM’s Watson is one of the, if not the most intelligent supercomputers in existence, and it proved that by destroying humans at Jeopardy in 2011. But Watson hasn’t always been the well behaved and polite game show contestant.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZwPnSa&via=Digg&text=What Happens When You Teach Watson The Urban Dictionary

div.a: Want To See Bin Laden's Autopsy Photos?

div.div: Thay have been classified since the May 2011 raid that killed him, but now the autopsy and burial photos of Osama bin Laden may be available for public viewing. A federal appeals court on Thursday will consider whether the public has that right.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZL8jl6&via=Digg&text=Want To See Bin Laden's Autopsy Photos?

div.div: YOU'LL STILL SMELL LIKE A DOUCHE

div.a: Axe Super Bowl Sweepstakes Offers You A Trip To Space

div.div: With Buzz Aldrin as their pitchman, Axe is offering a chance to win a seat on private spacecraft.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13lJ6g7&via=Digg&text=Axe Super Bowl Sweepstakes Offers You A Trip To Space

div.div: MAYBE YOU SHOULD JUST LET IT SPOIL

div.a: The Secret To Saving Spoiled Milk May Be Frog Slime

div.div: As if sour milk wasn’t ick-worthy enough, scientists from Moscow State University have just identified a number of potential antibiotic compounds in frog skin secretions which, if added to milk, could prevent it from going bad.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VNHlWM&via=Digg&text=The Secret To Saving Spoiled Milk May Be Frog Slime

div.a: Details Surface For A Mars-Based Reality Show

div.div: If you want to undergo eight years of daunting physical and psychological training, only to then be shipped off on a spaceship never to return to Earth, you're perfect for a new reality show, 'Mars One.'

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Sn154r&via=Digg&text=Details Surface For A Mars-Based Reality Show

div.div: DON'T BE AFRAID TO USE YOUR BUMPER

div.a: How To Be The Fastest Kid At The Go-Kart Track

div.div: Let's face it: racing is expensive. Many people can't afford to purchase a car, make it race-ready, and then proceed to crash it every weekend. Indoor go-karting, therefore, may be the most cost effective way to express your inner Jeff Gordon.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13htScH&via=Digg&text=How To Be The Fastest Kid At The Go-Kart Track

div.a: Unhinged Gun Company CEO Threatens To 'Start Killing People' Over Gun Control

div.div: The CEO of a Tennessee company that specializes weapons and tactical training is threatening to “start killing people” if President Barack Obama moves forward with gun control measures.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VNfbev&via=Digg&text=Unhinged Gun Company CEO Threatens To 'Start Killing People' Over Gun Control

div.div: "Psychiatry: An Industry of Death" is a multi-million dollar museum and visitor center that the Citizens Commission on Human Rights set up in Los Angeles. CCHR is an organization cofounded by the Church of Scientology.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U5awme&via=Digg&text=Scientologists Really, Really Hate Psychiatrists

div.div: NO ONE WANTS TO HIRE ANIMAL BREEDERS

div.a: The Jobs With The Highest And Lowest Unemployment Rates In The U.S.

div.div: What do petroleum engineers, detective supervisors, and animal breeders have in common? They're extremely employable.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VGBYXb&via=Digg&text=The Jobs With The Highest And Lowest Unemployment Rates In The U.S.

div.div: Brad Moore is a 28-year-old drummer from Ohio. He's also a member of one of the most popular K-pop bands.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13l7ePJ&via=Digg&text=The Caucasian King Of K-Pop

div.div: WAYS TO GET CHILDREN TO CRY

div.a: McDonald's Swaps Happy Meal Toys For Books

div.div: After a successful pilot program, McDonald's has pledged to distribute 15 million books in England over the next two years. In its Happy Meals. Instead of toys.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13jCUFf&via=Digg&text=McDonald's Swaps Happy Meal Toys For Books

div.a: The Most Wonderfully Unrealistic Gear From CES 2013

div.div: Sometimes, companies trot out devices and technology that could bring something new and wonderful to the market—it's just too bad the odds of this vaporware ever being for sale are slim to nil. Here's the best fantasy tech that wowed the gadget-lusting masses in 2013.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WFayPM&via=Digg&text=The Most Wonderfully Unrealistic Gear From CES 2013

div.a: Glenn Beck Says 3-D Printers Will Make America Great Again

div.div: Glenn Beck has seen the future, and it is 3-D printed.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13hKRMb&via=Digg&text=Glenn Beck Says 3-D Printers Will Make America Great Again

div.div: Tesla Motors founder and CEO Elon Musk wants to colonize Mars. And he won't take any meat eaters along for the ride.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UMLKv2&via=Digg&text=Mars Colonists Must Be Vegetarians

div.a: Why Stealing A $1 Trillion Coin Isn't Worth The Price Of A Getaway Van

div.div: Send the gang home now, and cancel the high-power laser rentals. While this all seems like a scenario from a comic book, it’s all just politics.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VKFy2t&via=Digg&text=Why Stealing A $1 Trillion Coin Isn't Worth The Price Of A Getaway Van

div.div: When a passenger aboard a Qantas flight en route to Port Moresby, Papua New Guinea, pointed out that a snake was slithering on the wing, she got the same reaction William Shatner did after he spotted a gremlin on his plane in the Twilight Zone: Mostly scoffing and disbelief.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RHMwqB&via=Digg&text=Python Survives Flight On Wing

div.a: How Everyone Will Be Answering Their Phones In Two Years

div.div: This innovation will revolutionize mobile telephony for the next decade.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TLwSKC&via=Digg&text=How Everyone Will Be Answering Their Phones In Two Years

div.div: THANKFULLY, BLOODY MARY MIX STILL SAFE

div.a: FAA Warns Flight Attendants About Exploding Coffee Filters

div.div: When a flight attendant serves up a cup of coffee, fliers are unlikely aware of just how much risk the crew took to deliver them that cup of joe.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10fVG2q&via=Digg&text=FAA Warns Flight Attendants About Exploding Coffee Filters

div.div: AT LEAST HE'S GOT PIERS MORGAN ON HIS SIDE

div.a: Oscar Host Seth MacFarlane Presents Nominations, Inspires Twitter Backlash

div.div: Earlier this morning Seth MacFarlane, this year's Oscars host, announced the Oscar nominations. It seemed like the entire world took to Twitter to weigh in.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11jYoTW&via=Digg&text=Oscar Host Seth MacFarlane Presents Nominations, Inspires Twitter Backlash

div.a: Why ‘Arrested Development’ Really Represents A Breakthrough For Netflix

div.div: The two most interesting things that Mitch Hurwitz, "Arrested Development"’s creator, explains about the Netflix episodes have nothing to do with what story they’d tell.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U7A820&via=Digg&text=Why ‘Arrested Development’ Really Represents A Breakthrough For Netflix

div.a: I'm In Love With A Mass Murderer

div.div: Misty Benjamin has photos of the Aurora shooter in her wallet and on her bedroom walls. "He's not an animal," she says.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10geajj&via=Digg&text=I'm In Love With A Mass Murderer

div.a: Freaky Dust Storm In Australia Is Terrific And Terrifying

div.div: Back in July 2011, many Americans heard the term “haboob” for the first term when a 50-mile-wide dust cloud rolled through and swallowed the Phoenix area. But that monster wall of dust has nothing on the terrifying, terrific tsunami of dust doom that swept through Onslow in Western Australia on Wednesday.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13leDhX&via=Digg&text=Freaky Dust Storm In Australia Is Terrific And Terrifying

div.a: Major League Baseball And T-Mobile Reinvent The Bullpen Phone

div.div: Why would baseball introduce touchscreen smartphones for managers to tell bullpen coaches to warm up a lefty?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10iR7EI&via=Digg&text=Major League Baseball And T-Mobile Reinvent The Bullpen Phone

div.a: Here Is What Happens When You Cast Lindsay Lohan In Your Movie

div.div: She never showed. Schrader and Pope texted and left messages on her phone. There was no answer. Schrader thought about what he should do. Right now, he had the upper hand; there really was an actress waiting in Paris. But once they started shooting, he’d lose the power. Lohan could hold the entire production hostage. So he fired her.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Zw3wyW&via=Digg&text=Here Is What Happens When You Cast Lindsay Lohan In Your Movie

div.div: TIPS ALSO USEFUL FOR 'PRICE IS RIGHT' STRATEGY

div.a: How Do You Know How Much To Charge For Something?

div.div: You can’t ask people who haven’t paid how much they’re willing to pay. Their answers don’t matter because there’s no cost to saying “yes” ”$20” “no” ”$100”. They all cost the same – nothing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Zy1cHQ&via=Digg&text=How Do You Know How Much To Charge For Something?

div.div: DON'T CALL IT A COVER UP

div.a: FBI Publishes Top Terms Used In Emails By Corporate Fraudsters

div.div: 'Cover up' tops list while 'nobody will find out' and 'grey area' also in top 10.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XCHm2D&via=Digg&text=FBI Publishes Top Terms Used In Emails By Corporate Fraudsters

div.div: According to the International Air Transport Association (IATA), an average passenger travelling on Western-built jetliners would have to take no fewer than 5.3m flights before being involved in an accident.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U8nkZ0&via=Digg&text=Flying Has Never Been Safer

div.a: How Corey Booker Overcame His Own Homophobia

div.div: “I was disgusted by gays. The thought of two men kissing each other was about as appealing as a frontal lobotomy.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WvoBYj&via=Digg&text=How Corey Booker Overcame His Own Homophobia
